name: Revenge
description: A protagonist seeks retribution against those who have wronged them
examples: The Count of Monte Cristo, Kill Bill, Gladiator

the_wrong.name: The Wrong
the_wrong.description: The protagonist suffers a grave injustice or loss

recognition.name: Recognition
recognition.description: The protagonist realizes the extent of the wrong and who is responsible

the_vow.name: The Vow
the_vow.description: The protagonist commits to seeking revenge

pursuit.name: The Pursuit
pursuit.description: The protagonist hunts down the target and gathers power

confrontation.name: Confrontation
confrontation.description: The protagonist faces the antagonist in direct conflict

justice.name: Justice
justice.description: Revenge is achieved, but at what cost?
